ai.summary: A scenic 6.6 km woodland loop at Killerton Estate, Danes Wood Walk follows shaded paths through mature trees, offering a moderate challenge with gentle gradients and plenty of natural beauty in Devon, England.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly well-defined woodland trails with compact gravel and packed earth. Expect muddy sections after rain, exposed roots, and occasional steps. Terrain is gently undulating, suitable for walkers with moderate fitness.
ai.safety_notes: Check weather and daylight hours; wear sturdy waterproof footwear; carry water and snacks; stay on marked paths; watch for uneven ground, roots, and low branches; carry a map or GPS and a charged phone; be mindful of wildlife and livestock; dogs on leads where required; allow extra time during busy estate days.
ai.best_seasons: Spring, Summer and Autumn; can be enjoyed year-round with appropriate preparation for winter conditions.

seo.title: Danes Wood Walk, Killerton – 6.6 km Moderate Hike in Devon, UK
seo.meta_description: Explore Danes Wood Walk at Killerton Estate: a 6.6 km moderate woodland loop in Devon, England. Practical hiking tips, gear suggestions, and safety advice for a rewarding day out.
